these essentials that you need to be

is going to be to greet your examiner
your examiner will greet himself or
herself and introduce themselves by

may say hi my name is Lisa Smith or good
afternoon my name is Lisa Smith can I
get your full name please
or what is your full name you have the

you may or may not give away the

your option however if you wish to the

please do not add any titles to the

remember titles are not added to the

hence you can simply say good afternoon
Lisa my name is Alicia Nayar alright
there you go
now when you give away your name be
extremely slow
don't be fast and say my name is Alicia

your examiner to understand your name
and of course when you're giving away
your name be proud of it and smile
because that is a display of your
comfort and your confidence so the next

examiner wants to know where are you

name of the place that you're from and
perhaps the location you can add a bit
more of information
but not too much so for example if I'm
asked where are you from I would love to
say I am from Mumbai the land of
Bollywood and I love Mumbai because it
is so cosmopolitan I don't need to give
all of that information I just need to
let the examiner know that I come from
Mumbai which is in the west of India
that's sufficient however be be very

want to say that I come from Mumbai you
will have to pronounce the name of the
